v8:item.v8:content: The result is entered as a fixed amount.
Warning formula is not filled in
по соответствию даты регистрации интервалу начисления
by correspondence between registration date and accrual interval
all accumulated values for the month

The result of basic accruals is determined for
При начислении за Апрель 2015 будет использовано значение расчетной базы за период Январь 2015 - Февраль 2015
On accrual for April 2015, value of the base for January 2015 - February 2015 will be used

To edit calculation indicators, fill the "Company", "Payroll fund", and "Calculation type" attributes
